K10D0246_H0247:50a-1: a'arya ba ra m'artha dharma bi dza ya n'a ma ma h'a y'a na s'u tra /
K10D0246_H0247:50a-2: bod skad du; 'phags pa don dam pa'i chos kyis
K10D0246_H0247:50a-3: rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen
K10D0246_H0247:50a-4: po'i mdo / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10D0246_H0247:50a-5: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K10D0246_H0247:50a-6: bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas
K10D0246_H0247:50a-7: ring po ma lon par ga ya'i ri la dge
K10D0246_H0247:50a-8: slong mngon par zhugs pa mngon par zhugs pa rnams
K10D0246_H0247:50a-9: dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te /
K10D0246_H0247:50a-10: lha bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang /
K10D0246_H0247:50a-14: dge bsnyen ma brgyad khri drug stong dang /
K10D0246_H0247:50a-16: gcer bu pa bye ba phrag bcu gnyis dang /
K10D0246_H0247:50a-17: drang srong chen po mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa /
K10D0246_H0247:50b-0: gdung ba lngas yan @50b lag chog pa lnga brgya yan lag dkar ba /
K10D0246_H0247:50b-1: sha med cing rus mgo lpags kyis yog pa /
K10D0246_H0247:50b-2: lto zhar zhing skra'i khur khyer ba /
K10D0246_H0247:50b-4: g-yang gzhi dang shing shun gyon pa /
K10D0246_H0247:50b-5: lag na ril pa thogs pa brgyad khri bzhi stong dang yang thabs gcig go /
K10D0246_H0247:50b-6: rgal bar 'dun pa rnams dang yang thabs cig go /
K10D0246_H0247:50b-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das ri nag po rnams kyi
K10D0246_H0247:50b-8: nang na ri'i rgyal po ri rab ltar drang srong
K10D0246_H0247:50b-9: rnams kyi nang na lham me /
K10D0246_H0247:50b-12: lug rnams kyi nang na glang po che'i rgyal po mche ba drug pa 'dra la /
K10D0246_H0247:50b-13: srin bu me khyer gyi drung na nyi zla dang mtshungs shing /
K10D0246_H0247:50b-14: rtsva ka shi'i me tog gi nang na mand'a ra ba'i yal ga dang 'dra la /
K10D0246_H0247:50b-15: nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po bya rog gis bskor
K10D0246_H0247:50b-16: ba dang 'dra bar bcom ldan 'das drang srong rnams
K10D0246_H0247:50b-17: kyi nang na nyis 'gyur du mdzes so //
K10D0246_H0247:50b-18: de nas bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i gtong ba
K10D0246_H0247:50b-19: [?] zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
K10D0246_H0247:50b-20: zhugs te / rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dpag tu
K10D0246_H0247:50b-21: med par mdzad cing glo g-yas g-yon gnyis nas 'od
K10D0246_H0247:50b-22: zhugs te / zer phyung ste / de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba dpag tu med pa phyung /
K10D0246_H0247:50b-23: byang chub sems dpa' bye ba dpag tu med pa dang /
K10D0246_H0247:50b-26: 'jig rten skyong ba dpag tu med pa phyung /
K10D0246_H0247:50b-27: dgra bcom pa brgya stong dpag tu med pa phyung /
K10D0246_H0247:50b-31: dge bsnyen ma brgya stong dpag tu med pa phyung /
K10D0246_H0247:51a-3: rig sngags 'chang dpag tu med pa phyung /
K10D0246_H0247:51a-8: nags khrod pa dpag tu med pa phyung /
K10D0246_H0247:51a-9: rgyal rigs shing s'a la chen po lta bu dang /
K10D0246_H0247:51a-10: bram ze dang khyim bdag shing s'a la chen po lta bu dang /
K10D0246_H0247:51a-14: smra ba'i skad sna tshogs pa ji snyed pa dang /
K10D0246_H0247:51a-15: lha'i ris ji snyed pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku las phyung ngo //
K10D0246_H0247:51a-16: de nas 'khor chen po de the tshom du gyur nas phan tshun gdong du lta'o //
K10D0246_H0247:51a-17: byang chub sems dpa' rnams rab tu dga' ste /
K10D0246_H0247:51a-18: rin po che'i char 'bebs pa nas rgyan thams cad kyi bar gyi char 'bebs so //
K10D0246_H0247:51a-19: de nas bcom ldan 'das rin po che gtong ba'i ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs te /
K10D0246_H0247:51a-20: sengge bsgyings pas phyogs bcur rnam par gzigs so //
K10D0246_H0247:51a-21: bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs bcur gzigs ma thag tu
K10D0246_H0247:51a-22: de nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag nas
K10D0246_H0247:51a-23: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed sangs rgyas kyi
K10D0246_H0247:51a-24: spyan la snang ba de dag thams cad lag mthil
K10D0246_H0247:51a-25: du bzhag pa bzhin du mi mjed kyi 'jig rten
K10D0246_H0247:51a-26: gyi khams su kun tu snang ngo //
K10D0246_H0247:51a-27: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang bcom ldan
K10D0246_H0247:51a-28: 'das sh'akya thub pas ji ltar phyung ba de 'dra
K10D0246_H0247:51a-29: ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul phyung ste /
K10D0246_H0247:51a-30: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sprul pa phyung ba
K10D0246_H0247:51b-0: ji @51b snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang bcom
K10D0246_H0247:51b-1: ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su dong ste
K10D0246_H0247:51b-2: phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi nang du
K10D0246_H0247:51b-4: byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa dag kyang dge slong dang /
K10D0246_H0247:51b-7: dge bsnyen ma gangg'a'i bye ma snyed dag dang lhan
K10D0246_H0247:51b-8: cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa chen
K10D0246_H0247:51b-9: po dpe med pa thogs te 'dir lhags so //
K10D0246_H0247:51b-19: mi ma yin pa du ma de dag kyang bcom
K10D0246_H0247:51b-20: ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul de mthong
K10D0246_H0247:51b-21: nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ngo
K10D0246_H0247:51b-22: // de nas gang dag phyogs bcu nas lhags pa'i
K10D0246_H0247:51b-23: byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis mchod pa bla
K10D0246_H0247:51b-24: na med pas bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byas
K10D0246_H0247:51b-25: te pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis yongs su
K10D0246_H0247:51b-26: bsgrubs pa'i stan dag la 'khod do //
K10D0246_H0247:51b-28: mi ma yin pa'i bar du'ang ci rigs pa'i stan dag la 'khod do //
K10D0246_H0247:51b-29: gang dag bcom ldan 'das kyis sprul ba phyung ba
K10D0246_H0247:51b-30: de dag kyang mnar med pa yan chad 'og min
K10D0246_H0247:51b-31: gyi gnas man chad du mngon par byung ste slar
K10D0246_H0247:51b-32: yang log go / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis
K10D0246_H0247:51b-33: sprul ba phyung ba ji snyed pa de dag thams
K10D0246_H0247:51b-34: yang log go / cad ni / bcom ldan 'das
K10D0246_H0247:51b-35: sh'akya thub pa'i spu'i khung bu thams cad du nub
K10D0246_H0247:52a-0: yang log go / cad ni / bo // gang dag bcom ldan 'das kyi sprul ba phyung @52a *//
K10D0246_H0247:52a-2: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku rnams su nub bo //
K10D0246_H0247:52a-3: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
K10D0246_H0247:52a-4: rgyal pa'i phung po zhes bya ba stan las langs
K10D0246_H0247:52a-5: te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bus
K10D0246_H0247:52a-6: mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom
K10D0246_H0247:52a-7: ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo
K10D0246_H0247:52a-8: sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su
K10D0246_H0247:52a-9: bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do //
K10D0246_H0247:52a-10: kye ma mi rnams kyi ni 'dren pa yis //
K10D0246_H0247:52a-11: sngon chad ma byung mdzad pa sna tshogs 'di //
K10D0246_H0247:52a-12: skye rgu kun la myur du kun bstan pa //
K10D0246_H0247:52a-13: de yis bdud sde thams cad mog mog bgyis //
K10D0246_H0247:52a-14: phan tshun dag tu tshig tu smra bgyid pa //
K10D0246_H0247:52a-15: kye ma'o shin tu ngo mtshar che zhes mchi //
K10D0246_H0247:52a-16: bdag cag ci zhig phyir ni 'dir lhags kye //
K10D0246_H0247:52a-17: bdag cag bcom mo bdag cag bcom zhes mchi //
K10D0246_H0247:52a-18: dka' thub can bdag dka' thub can mi 'gyur //
K10D0246_H0247:52a-19: nyam chung lus la pags pa tsam zhig las //
K10D0246_H0247:52a-20: bdag 'khogs bdag bskams bde ba rnams las nyams //
K10D0246_H0247:52a-21: bdag cag rdzu 'phrul thob par gyur ma yin //
K10D0246_H0247:52a-22: yi ge ma mchis rdzu 'phrul gsum rnams kyis //
K10D0246_H0247:52a-23: bstan pa'i dgra rnams mog mog gyur par mdzad //
K10D0246_H0247:52a-24: bstan pa'i 'dren pa khyod kyis de ring ni //
K10D0246_H0247:52a-25: sangs rgyas sras la dus ston chen po mdzad //
K10D0246_H0247:52a-27: dga' ba skyes shing sems kyang rab dga' ste //
K10D0246_H0247:52b-0: @52b gang zhig gnas nas lha tshogs bdag cag kyang //
K10D0246_H0247:52b-1: 'jig rten mgon pa sangs rgyas gyur cig mchi //
K10D0246_H0247:52b-2: 'jam dbyangs sangs rgyas mang po bsnyen bkur bgyis //
K10D0246_H0247:52b-3: sangs rgyas sras po mtha' yas rnams kyis bskor //
K10D0246_H0247:52b-4: 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni 'khor gyi nang na mchis //
K10D0246_H0247:52b-5: cho 'phrul rnam par phye ste bstan du gsol //
K10D0246_H0247:52b-6: 'di dag chos ni gang gi ltas shig las //
K10D0246_H0247:52b-7: thub pa chos ni gang zhig gsung bar bzhed //
K10D0246_H0247:52b-8: 'khor 'di thams cad 'bod cing mchis lags na //
K10D0246_H0247:52b-9: sems can thugs brtse'i slad du bdag la gsungs //
K10D0246_H0247:52b-10: de nas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis 'khor
K10D0246_H0247:52b-11: de'i nang nas drang srong chen po me sgron zhes
K10D0246_H0247:52b-12: bya ba zhig gis byang chub sems dpa' rgyal ba'i
K10D0246_H0247:52b-13: phung po la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10D0246_H0247:52b-14: kye gzhon nu re zhig kha rog cig /
K10D0246_H0247:52b-15: kho bos dri ba dri bar bya'o //
K10D0246_H0247:52b-16: gal te kho bo'i dri ba khong du chud par byed na ni /
K10D0246_H0247:52b-17: de thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya ba'i ming dang yang mthun no //
K10D0246_H0247:52b-18: 'on te sred med kyi bu dang /
K10D0246_H0247:52b-19: dbang phyug chen pos phyung ba'i 'gro lding ba rnams
K10D0246_H0247:52b-20: kyis sprul ba byed du bcug na 'dir ngo mtshar
K10D0246_H0247:52b-23: sgyu ma mkhan rnams kyis 'di 'grub bo //
K10D0246_H0247:52b-24: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa'i zhal gyis
K10D0246_H0247:52b-25: drang srong gi tshogs la kun tu gzigs nas drang
K10D0246_H0247:52b-26: srong chen po me sgron la 'di skad ces bka'
K10D0246_H0247:52b-27: stsal to // tshe dang ldan pa drang srong chen po /
K10D0246_H0247:52b-28: ci nus kyis dri ba dris shig dang rnam par sbyang bar bya'o //
K10D0246_H0247:53a-1: 'das la drang srong chen po me sgron gyis 'di skad gsol to //
K10D0246_H0247:53a-3: sems can gyi skye ba gang nas byung /
K10D0246_H0247:53a-4: ci'i slad du bskal pas sreg par 'gyur /
K10D0246_H0247:53a-5: sems can rnams gnas gang du 'du bar 'gyur /
K10D0246_H0247:53a-6: nang na sems can phra ba khru gang tsam mam /
K10D0246_H0247:53a-16: sems can ji tsam zhig nang na mchis bka' stsol cig /
K10D0246_H0247:53a-17: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong chen po me sgron la drang srong chen po /
K10D0246_H0247:53a-22: tshe bskal pa drug cu pa'i dri ba 'dri ba 'di ni /
K10D0246_H0247:53a-24: de nas drang srong chen po rnams ngo mtshar du gyur te /
K10D0246_H0247:53a-25: drang srong chen po me sgron gyi tshe'i tshad ni /
K10D0246_H0247:53a-26: ma brjod par bdag cag lhan cig gnas pa rnams kyis kyang ma shes na /
K10D0246_H0247:53a-28: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0246_H0247:53a-30: de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang bshad do //
K10D0246_H0247:53a-31: drang srong chen po gang nga la sems can gyi
K10D0246_H0247:53a-32: skye ba gang nas byung zhes smras pa de ni
K10D0246_H0247:53a-33: / yi ges brjod pa ma yin pa'o //
K10D0246_H0247:53a-34: sems can zhes bya ba ni /
K10D0246_H0247:53a-35: ma rig pa'i rkyen nas skye ba dang /
K10D0246_H0247:53a-36: rga shi'i bar du byung ba'o //
K10D0246_H0247:53b-0: yang rgyu rkyen las @53b sems can skyes te /
K10D0246_H0247:53b-6: gang gi tshe yongs su rtog pas kun nas bslang
K10D0246_H0247:53b-7: ba'i las kyi rlung rnams kyis bud med kyi grong
K10D0246_H0247:53b-11: yang sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /
K10D0246_H0247:53b-14: sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa ni /
K10D0246_H0247:53b-16: nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga dang /
K10D0246_H0247:53b-23: sems can yang gzhan ma yin no //
K10D0246_H0247:53b-28: drang srong chen pos gsol pa /
K10D0246_H0247:53b-30: gal te sems can 'grib pa ma mchis 'phel ba ma mchis na /
K10D0246_H0247:53b-31: ci'i slad du sems can khyi'i skye gnas nas shi 'phos te dbang sgyur du 'gyur /
K10D0246_H0247:53b-32: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0246_H0247:53b-35: ji skad smras pa de bzhin du ma yin no /
K10D0246_H0247:53b-36: gal te dbang sgyur dbang sgyur yin du zin na ni /
K10D0246_H0247:53b-37: dbang med par 'chi bar mi rigs so //
K10D0246_H0247:53b-39: gang rang gi lus kyi gtso bo ma yin pa de ji ltar dbang sgyur du 'gyur /
K10D0246_H0247:54a-0: srin bu me khyer 'di snyam du bdag gis dzambu'i @54a *//
K10D0246_H0247:54a-1: gling snang bar bya'o snyam du sems pa'i rkyen gyis
K10D0246_H0247:54a-2: srin bu me khyer gyis dzambu'i gling snang bar byed
K10D0246_H0247:54a-3: dam / sems mdul ba'i dbang sgyur yang dag pa ma yin no; ;drang srong chen po /
K10D0246_H0247:54a-4: yang gal te dbang sgyur nyon mongs pa 'bra bar gyur na ni /
K10D0246_H0247:54a-5: khyi la nyon mongs pa shas che bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0246_H0247:54a-6: gang gi tshe dbang sgyur dang nyon mongs pa dag
K10D0246_H0247:54a-7: khyi la yod cing dbang sgyur la'ang yod pa de'i
K10D0246_H0247:54a-8: tshe sems can 'grib pa'ang mi dmigs /
K10D0246_H0247:54a-10: drang srong chen pos gsol pa /
K10D0246_H0247:54a-11: goo ta mas nyon mongs pa 'grib par mdzad dam /
K10D0246_H0247:54a-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0246_H0247:54a-14: ngas phyin ci log dag bzlog pa'ang med /
K10D0246_H0247:54a-16: drang srong chen pos gsol pa /
K10D0246_H0247:54a-18: khyod kyang dbang sgyur ma lags so //
K10D0246_H0247:54a-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0246_H0247:54a-22: ma byung ba'i phyir nga yang dbang sgyur ma yin no; ;drang srong chen pos gsol pa /
K10D0246_H0247:54a-25: goo ta ma'i sras kyis pha ma 'grogs pa las sems can skye'o //
K10D0246_H0247:54a-27: sems can mang du 'grogs pa la sems can skye ba nyung bar gyur pa 'di ci lta bu /
K10D0246_H0247:54a-28: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0246_H0247:54a-29: khyod la dpe bstan par bya'o //
K10D0246_H0247:54b-0: @54b sa bon gcig las shing skye bar 'gyur te /
K10D0246_H0247:54b-1: 'bras bu gcig las kyang 'bras bu mtha' yas par 'gyur ro //
K10D0246_H0247:54b-3: gcig sa bon gyi 'os su 'gyur gyi /
K10D0246_H0247:54b-4: lhag ma sa bon gyi 'os su mi 'gyur ba de ci lta bu /
K10D0246_H0247:54b-5: drang srong chen pos gsol pa /
K10D0246_H0247:54b-7: rlung dang nyi mas shing tog rnams ma rung bar bgyis so //
K10D0246_H0247:54b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0246_H0247:54b-9: drang srong chen po; de de bzhin te /
K10D0246_H0247:54b-10: las kyi rlung gis kyang sems can gyi 'bras bu rnams ma rung bar byas so //
K10D0246_H0247:54b-13: mngal na gnas pa nyid kyi tshe srin bu rnams kyis zos so; ;kha cig ni /
K10D0246_H0247:54b-14: las kyi rlung rnams kyis phye mar byas so //
K10D0246_H0247:54b-18: sems can gyi nyes pa ni /
K10D0246_H0247:54b-21: yang sems can gyi khams ni /
K10D0246_H0247:54b-22: yongs su rtog pas kun nas bslang ba ste /
K10D0246_H0247:54b-24: sems can rnams kyi sems dang sems las byung ba
K10D0246_H0247:54b-25: 'jug pa ji snyed pa de snyed du srid pa
K10D0246_H0247:54b-26: la dmigs te / drang srong chen po /
K10D0246_H0247:54b-27: de'i phyir sems can gyi khams ni /
K10D0246_H0247:54b-28: yongs su rtog pas kun nas bslang ba'o //
K10D0246_H0247:54b-30: drang srong chen pos gsol pa /
K10D0246_H0247:54b-35: ci'i slad du bskal pas sreg par 'gyur pa bka' stsol cig /
K10D0246_H0247:54b-36: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0246_H0247:55a-1: kyi dbyings 'dus ma byas pa'i phyir bskal pas sreg par 'gyur ro //
K10D0246_H0247:55a-3: gal te bskal pas sreg par mi 'gyur na /
K10D0246_H0247:55a-4: chos kyi dbyings gnyis su 'gyur te /
K10D0246_H0247:55a-7: de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa smra bar mi 'gyur ro //
K10D0246_H0247:55a-9: gang gi phyir 'di thams cad rtag pa ma yin /
K10D0246_H0247:55a-11: dbugs phyin pa ma yin pa de'i tshe de bzhin
K10D0246_H0247:55a-12: gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya ba de'i
K10D0246_H0247:55a-13: ming thob bo // drang srong chen pos bram ze'i
K10D0246_H0247:55a-14: khye'u la smras pa; 'di thams cad mkhyen par mtshan
K10D0246_H0247:55a-15: ming thob bo // gsol pa ni / mthun no //
K10D0246_H0247:55a-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0246_H0247:55a-18: gal te bskal pas bsregs par ma gyur na /
K10D0246_H0247:55a-22: zhes bya bar dus tha dad pa med par 'gyur ro //
